title: Geometric Neural Distance Fields for Learning Human Motion Priors
summary: We introduce Neural Riemannian Motion Fields (NRMF), a novel 3D generative human motion prior that enables robust, temporally consistent, and physically plausible 3D motion recovery. Our framework explicitly models human motion in the zero level set of neural distance fields corresponding to pose, transition, and acceleration dynamics.
